person.persName: John Bledsoe Laffoon (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer, pvt 10th ky cav (csa))

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John B. Laffoon and Susan Laffoon. Married to Martha Laffoon. Father of Susan J. Laffoon and Armarillis Laffoon. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Marion, Missouri, in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1863. Served in the 10th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as private. Reported as deserted on March 13, 1865. Signed a loyalty oath to the U. S. government on April 8, 1865.
